        public static double[][] getRamachandranMatrixOfChains(Chain[] chains)
        Calculates a ramachandran matrix of all amino acids in all Chain. This matrix could be used to draw ramachandran plots
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        [phi,psi] 360 x 360 matrix
